description:
A vibrant minimal design system featuring:
- Blue primary color with rose accent on neutral stone background
- Clean typography with 1.25 modular scale
- 8px grid spacing system with generous whitespace
- Consistent, accessible UI components
- Modern, energetic yet sophisticated aesthetic
- Proper dark mode with maintained contrast

raw_outputs.colors.png:
IS_RENDERED_UI: yes
COLOR_STRATEGY: 8/10 - The color palette is limited and bold, with a strong emphasis on blue and rose colors. The contrast between the primary colors and the background colors is good, creating a visually appealing design.
WHITE_SPACE: 8/10 - The layout is clean and there is ample negative space between elements. The spacing between elements is well-balanced, creating a sense of depth and hierarchy.
TYPOGRAPHY: 8/10 - The typography is clear and consistent, with a modern font used for the primary and secondary text. The contrast between the text and background colors is good, making the text easy to read.
VISUAL_NOISE: 7/10 - The design is minimalistic with few decorative elements. The layout is clean and there is no clutter. The use of color and typography is effective in creating a professional and energetic feel.
ACCESSIBILITY: 8/10 - The text is readable with sufficient contrast ratios. The layout is accessible and there is no visual clutter.
EMOTIONAL_IMPACT: 8/10 - The design is modern and professional, with a bold and energetic feel. The use of color and typography creates a visually appealing and engaging design.
OVERALL: 8/10 - The UI is well-designed with a limited color palette, clean layout, clear typography, minimal visual noise, good accessibility, and a modern, professional, and energetic feel.

raw_outputs.components.png:
IS_RENDERED_UI: yes
COLOR_STRATEGY: 8/10 - The color palette is limited and bold, with a focus on black and white. The use of a single color for the magnifying glass icon and the email icon adds a modern and professional feel to the UI.
WHITE_SPACE: 9/10 - The layout is clean with generous negative space around the elements. The spacing between the text and the icons is well-balanced, making the UI easy to read.
TYPOGRAPHY: 9/10 - The type hierarchy is clear, with a mix of fonts and sizes used for different elements. The font choices are consistent and the contrast ratios are sufficient.
VISUAL_NOISE: 8/10 - The UI has a minimalistic design with no excessive decorative elements. The icons are well-placed and do not distract from the text.
ACCESSIBILITY: 9/10 - The text is readable with sufficient contrast ratios, and the icons are clearly visible. The layout is easy to navigate.
EMOTIONAL_IMPACT: 9/10 - The UI has a modern and professional feel, with a clean layout and clear type hierarchy. The icons are well-placed and do not distract from the text.
OVERALL: 9/10 - The UI is well-designed with a limited color palette, clean layout, clear typography, minimalistic design, sufficient contrast ratios, and clear accessibility features. The overall feel is modern and professional.
raw_outputs.spacing.png:
IS_RENDERED_UI: yes
COLOR_STRATEGY: 8/10 - The color palette is limited and bold, with a focus on black, white, and gray. The use of these colors creates a professional and clean look.
WHITE_SPACE: 8/10 - The layout is clean with generous negative space between elements. The spacing is consistent and well thought out.
TYPOGRAPHY: 8/10 - The typography is clear and consistent, with a balanced use of type sizes and styles. The font choices are appropriate for the design.
VISUAL_NOISE: 7/10 - The design is minimalistic with a focus on functionality. There is no excessive decorative clutter.
ACCESSIBILITY: 7/10 - The text is readable with sufficient contrast ratios. The layout is accessible for all users.
EMOTIONAL_IMPACT: 8/10 - The design is modern and professional, with a energetic feel.
OVERALL: 8/10 - The UI is well designed with strategic use of color, spacing, typography, and visual elements. The layout is clean and accessible, with a professional feel.
raw_outputs.typography.png:
IS_RENDERED_UI: yes
COLOR_STRATEGY: 8/10 - The color palette is limited and uses bold accents to create a strong visual hierarchy. The text is clear and readable, with sufficient contrast ratios.
WHITE_SPACE: 8/10 - The layout is clean with generous negative space, making the UI easy to read and navigate.
TYPOGRAPHY: 8/10 - The typography is clear and consistent, with a balanced use of fonts and weights. The text hierarchy is effective, guiding the reader through the content.
VISUAL_NOISE: 7/10 - The UI has a modern, professional, and energetic feel with minimal decorative clutter. The purposeful elements are well-integrated.
ACCESSIBILITY: 7/10 - The text is readable, with sufficient contrast ratios. However, the UI could benefit from more emphasis on accessibility features like keyboard navigation.
EMOTIONAL_IMPACT: 7/10 - The UI has a professional and energetic feel, but the text could be more dynamic and engaging.
OVERALL: 8/10 - The UI is well-designed with a clear color palette, effective typography, clean layout, and sufficient white space. The text is readable and has a modern, professional feel.
